[File: aptos-core/types/src/account_config/events/uri_mutation_event.rs] [Function: new()] [Path traversal] Can malicious URIs containing path traversal sequences (../../etc/passwd) be stored via new() and later exploited if the URI is used by off-chain systems that resolve file paths? (Medium)
